activities: Cook MyoSite is an innovative clinical research company that is part of Cook Group Incorporated, a global medical device company headquartered in Bloomington, Indiana USA.  In connection with its business activities, Cook MyoSite collects and processes personal information pertaining to residents of the European Union and Switzerland for purposes of clinical research and customer order processing.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Clinical research participant and customer personal data in all formats, including electronic and off-line.
recoursemech: EU Data Protection Authorities (DPAs) and Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC)
